details.n: Konosuba: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!

ratings.en: God's Blessings on This Bright Future!
A Smile for This Dour Girl!
A Re-education for This Bright Little Girl!
Divine Punishment for This Handsome Gentleman Thief!
Nefarious Friends for This Sheltered Princess!
A Farewell to This Lavish Lifestyle!
Rest for This Up-and-Coming Adventurer!
An Eternal Rest for the Master of This Lake!
A Talking-To for This Runaway!
Blessings for This Selfish Bride!
God's Blessings for These Unchanging Days!
Bonus Stage 1: Red Stream Explosion
Bonus Stage 2: Watch Out for Impostors!
The blessings of God in this wonderful choker!
Kono Jishou Megami to Isekai Tenshou o!
Kono Chuunibyou ni Bakuen o!
Kono Migite ni Pantsu o!
Kono Kyouteki ni Bakuretsu Mahou o!
Kono Maken ni Onedan o!
Kono Roku de mo Nai Tatakai ni Kecchaku o!
Kono Kogoesou na Kisetsu ni Nidome no Shi o!
Kono Fuyu o Kosenai Oretachi ni Ai no Te o!
Kono Subarashii Mise ni Shukufuku o!
Kono Rifujin na Yousai ni Shuuen o!
Give Me Deliverance from This Judicial Injustice!
A Friend for This Crimson Demon Girl!
Peace for the Master of This Labyrinth!
A Betrothed for This Noble Daughter!
Servitude for This Masked Knight!
Goodbye to This Irritating Living World!
An Invitation for This Knucklehead!
Sightseeing in This Pitiful City!
A Goddess for This Corrupt Hot Springs Town!
God's Blessings on This Wonderful Party!
OVA: God's Blessings on This Wonderful Piece of Art!
